name: Jobma
description: Jobma innovative use of pre-recorded & live video interviews, audio interviews, and digital assessments give employers the capability to drastically improve their quality of hire while cutting down on costs and hiring time.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Hire better Faster
ShortDescription: Jobma is a Digital interviewing platform designed to help companies of all sizes across the globe hire

Highlights.name: One way & live interviews
Highlights.description: Design a one way video interview that leads your applicants through a series of video, audio, written & multiple choice questions.

Highlights.name: Customizable to your brand
Highlights.description: Customize the interview process to include your logo, branding and colors. Give candidates a stellar experience.

Highlights.name: Sharing & collaboration tools
Highlights.description: Include stake holders earlier in the recruitment pipeline. Share pre-recorded video interviews, include comments, tags and ratings.

enhanced_description: Jobma is a Digital interviewing platform designed to help companies of all sizes across the globe hire better and faster. It innovatively utilizes pre-recorded and live video interviews, audio interviews, and digital assessments. This system enables employers to drastically improve their quality of hire, cut down on hiring costs, and reduce hiring time. Key features include one-way and live interviews with video, audio, written, and multiple-choice questions, customization for branding, and sharing and collaboration tools for stakeholders, allowing comments, tags, and ratings.
key_use_cases: Conducting remote video interviews (one-way and live)
Administering digital assessments (video, audio, written, multiple-choice questions)
Facilitating collaboration among hiring stakeholders (sharing interviews, adding comments, tags, and ratings)
Enhancing candidate experience through customizable branded interviews
Improving hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Support for pre-recorded and live video, audio, and digital assessments
Offers extensive branding customization for candidate experience
Provides robust sharing and collaboration tools for stakeholders
